plot: Johan collapses after viewing a picture book.

Dieter learns about a life-threatening child's game from a survivor, Martin, in the hospital. Johan influenced Martin to play this game by saying those who survive are "chosen". Johan also tells Martin that he will be shot by a Japanese person soon. Mr. Schubert decides to donate his library of books to the Munich University as suggested by Johan and Karl. The University decided to host a ceremony for Mr. Schubert about this donation and Dr. Tenma decides that he will execute Johan there. While Johan was in the library looking for a picture book to give to Martin he collapses.—Isaiah
